# VZXHCIController

**Class**

A class that represents a USB Extensible Host Controller Interface (XHCI) controller in a VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZXHCIController
```

## Overview

Don’t create `VZXHCIController` objects directly. Instead, you create a `VZXHCIController` object at runtime though the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration/usbControllers] property of the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtualMachineConfiguration] object by populating it with [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZXHCIControllerConfiguration] objects.

## Controllers

- **VZUSBController**: A class that represents a USB controller in a VM.

## Inherits From

- VZUSBController
